snippet: Celebrating its 50th anniversary, the American Symphony Orchestra looks back to its founder, Leopold Stokowski, and some of his achievements and adds new adventures in keeping with the revivalist mission of its present conductor, Leon Botstein.
abstract: Celebrating its 50th anniversary, the American Symphony Orchestra looks back to its founder, Leopold Stokowski, and some of his achievements and adds new adventures in keeping with the revivalist mission of its present conductor, Leon Botstein.

headline.main: The American Symphony, at 50, Harks Back to Stokowski
headline.print_headline: American Symphony Harks Back to Stokowski
